interestingcomments.content:
Next lens purchase? Seeking advice from the old heads. /!/ Hey folks. I’m a new Fuji boy; just got my X-T1 about a month ago. I’ve been shooting with the 35 f/2, but it’s time to broaden my horizons...and focal length. 

I’m looking to go a bit wider, so I am looking toward my next lens purchase. I’m considering either the 23mm f/1.4 or the f/2. Also considering the 18-55mm since it’s so cheap and zoom lenses are so practical. 

My long-term goal is to completely switch from Nikon to Fuji. I use Nikon for work right now and Fuji for fun, but once I’ve developed a sufficient Fuji kit, I’ll buy a newer body and migrate over completely. With that in mind, I’d like my next lens purchase to be a permanent member of my future kit. 

Weather sealing isn’t super important to me. Autofocus speed isn’t super important to me. The 16mm 1.4 is a bit too wide for me right now. 

Let me know which of the three lenses you prefer! If you have any alternative suggestions, I’d be glad to hear them.
